ISSUE.TITLE: Wrong language
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Bug Under Security Setup -> Default Permissions, API / Web services (REST server) It shows "Générer / modifier la clé API des utilisateurs" This is not English. ### Environment Version 17.0.1 ### Environment OS Ubuntu Linux ### Environment Web server Apache ### Environment PHP 8.1 ### Environment Database Postgres 9.5 ### Environment URL(s) http://localhost/dolibarr/admin/perms.php ### Expected and actual behavior Should show in english. Google translate shows "Generate/modify users API key" ### Steps to reproduce the behavior _No response_ ### Attached files _No response_

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Fix #25150 : add trans for api permission
Merge pull request #25155 from Hystepik/develop_v17#1 Fix #25150 : add trans for api permission
